commit.message: New method for processing ui changes

nodes.bodyText:
@sambarboza ,
styling of this button isn't consistent with the styling of similar buttons on OnboardingActivity (create_new_wallet, recovery_wallet, restore_wallet). Last time I overlooked this, but it also applies to Register button. I guess this is caused by the inconsistency in designs but should be unified.
Here is how it looks like:

  
    
      dash-wallet/wallet/res/layout/activity_onboarding.xml
    
    
        Lines 47 to 52
      in
      08e361e
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <Button 
        

        
          
               android:id="@+id/create_new_wallet" 
        

        
          
               style="@style/DashButton.Blue" 
        

        
          
               android:layout_width="match_parent" 
        

        
          
               android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
        

        
          
               android:text="@string/onboarding_create_wallet" /> 
        
    
  


The biggest difference is the font size, but also height should be the same.
I applied the same style in Confirm & Pay button from NewAccountConfirmDialog:

  
    
      dash-wallet/wallet/res/layout/dialog_new_account_confirm.xml
    
    
        Lines 64 to 71
      in
      eec4f47
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <Button 
        

        
          
               android:id="@+id/confirm" 
        

        
          
               style="@style/DashButton.Blue" 
        

        
          
               android:layout_width="match_parent" 
        

        
          
               android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
        

        
          
               android:layout_margin="16dp" 
        

        
          
               android:enabled="false" 
        

        
          
               android:text="@string/new_account_confirm_button_text" />
